input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Chore Pant"
Reference Product Description:
The Chore Pant in Aged Penny Chipped Canvas from Taylor Stitch 12.5-oz. 100% organic cotton canvas. 6-oz. 100% organic cotton SF Map pocketing. Stone washed for a worn in look and feel. Angled front slash pockets for easy entry. Two half-lined back patch pockets. Signature double-knee reinforced construction. Pen sleeve on both front panels. Front and back pockets bar-tacked at stress points. Button fly closure. Double-needle construction throughout. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Slim Travel Jean Pants'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Weekend Performance Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Performance Traveler Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Tech Pant'
  - Name='Everlane Women's Wide-leg Stretch Linen Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Tall Sweatpants'
  - Name='Everlane The Easy Pant Straight Leg Jeans'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Organic Taper Jeans'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Sweat Drawstring Pull On Jogger'
  - Name='Everlane Women's Utility Barrel Pants'
  - Name='Italian Gurkha Trouser Pants for Men by Bonobos'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Athletic Fit Weekday Warrior Dress Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Ultra Stretch Tall Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Stretch Easy Ankle Pants'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Men Aaron Jeans'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Single Knee Pant'
  - Name='Men Carhartt WIP Floyde Pant'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Straight Chino Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Relaxed Linen Blend Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Tall 2-Way Stretch Ankle Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Wide Straight Jeans'
  - Name='Everlane Women's Dream Pant'
  - Name='Outerknown Ambassador'
  - Name='Women Carhartt WIP Womenâ€™s Drewe Pant'
  - Name='Carhartt WIP Men Landon'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Slim Travel Jean Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are men's pants but Bonobos are slim travel jeans whereas the reference is organic cotton chore pants with durable construction; different materials and purpose.
Both are men's casual pants with chinos likely comparable in style and use, but the reference has heavier organic cotton canvas with reinforced knees, differing in fabric and ruggedness.
Similar casual men's pants designed for travel and performance; likely similar silhouette but reference has heavier canvas fabric and workwear construction.
Tech Pant implies synthetic performance fabric with stretch; different material focus from the reference's organic cotton canvas chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Women's Wide-leg Stretch Linen Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different gender focus, wide-leg stretch linen pants are quite different in silhouette and fabric from the reference chore pant.
Sweatpants are casual knit lounge pants, very different in construction, fabric, and style compared to chore pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane The Easy Pant Straight Leg Jeans
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's straight leg jeans are similar in silhouette but the reference uses heavy organic cotton canvas with special reinforcement, differing in fabric and details.
Men's tapered organic jeans share organic cotton material theme and men's casual pant style but differ in fabric weight and construction details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Sweat Drawstring Pull On Jogger
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Joggers with drawstring pull on waistband and sweat fabric are fundamentally different in purpose and construction from chore pants.
Utility barrel pants share the 'utility' concept but differ in gender, silhouette (wide/barrel leg), and likely fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Italian Gurkha Trouser Pants for Men by Bonobos
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Gurkha trousers are dressier, tailored pants very different in style and function from rugged chore pants.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bonobos Men's Athletic Fit Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress pants aimed at professional wear do not align closely with rugged, casual chore pant style and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Ultra Stretch Tall Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stretch fabric pants emphasize flexibility and casual wear but lack the durable cotton canvas and reinforced details of chore pants.
Easy ankle pants with stretch differ in fabric and rugged construction from the chore pant.
Carhartt WIP focuses on workwear style; jeans differ in fabric but share rugged intent and construction similar to chore pant.
Single knee pants from Carhartt WIP are very close in workwear style and construction with reinforced knees, similar fabric weight and purpose to the reference chore pant.
Floyde pant likely a rugged work pant close in function and style though specific details unknown; probably similar relevance to chore pant.
Straight chino pants are casual men's pants with similar silhouette but differ in fabric weight and reinforced features.
Relaxed linen blend pants differ significantly in fabric, weight and style from the heavy organic cotton chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Tall 2-Way Stretch Ankle Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Stretch ankle pants focus on lightweight fabric and flexibility unlike the rugged chore pant construction.
Wide straight jeans may share casual pant function but differ in fabric and silhouette details from chore pant.
Women's dressier or softer silhouette pant not closely aligned with rugged menâ€™s chore pant.
Outerknown Ambassador pants are casual menâ€™s pants but more fashion oriented than workwear, less rugged construction than chore pant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women Carhartt WIP Womenâ€™s Drewe Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's version of Carhartt pants likely share some rugged traits but different gender focus and possibly different silhouette and fit.
Carhartt WIP Landon pants are rugged men's workwear style pants likely similar in fabric and reinforced construction to the chore pant.
